author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Developers at Pearl Abyss have dropped some details on the world of Crimson Desert. Via the Gaming Interviews YouTube channel, the devs had specified that the open world of Crimson Desert is about twice as large as Skyrim's, and larger as a whole than Red Dead Redemption 2. But they're aware that a large, empty world is no fun to play in, so the game will be 'incredibly interactive.' In other news, Larian Studios did an AMA on Reddit, and the company confirmed their upcoming Divinity RPG will have co-op. You will also be able to make meaningful changes to the story. And finally, fans of BioWare's Anthem are rallying to save the game ahead of server closures next week. The game was an infamous misfire for BioWare, and it never really found an audience large enough to support the game's live-service ambitions. But fans are working to get custom servers up, as the game will go offline permamently when the last official serviers go dark on Monday.
title: Crimson Desert's Open World Map is Bigger Than Skyrim and Red Dead Redemption 2 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Eifel Free Roam Trailer for Assetto Corsa EVO, a racing simulation game developed by Kunos Simulazioni. Players can get a look at the new Eifel Free Roam, allowing drivers to explore the German Eifel region surrounding the Nürburgring. The Eifel Free Roam mode is available now in Assetto Corsa EVO as part of the Early Access Program for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Assetto Corsa EVO - Official Eifel Free Roam Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the Release Month Reveal Trailer for SAND: Raiders of Sophie, a team-based multiplayer shooter developed by Hologryph and TowerHaus. Players will fight among the sands of Sophie in towering mechs to attain loot, dispatch other players, and more. SAND: Raiders of Sophie is releasing in March 2026 for PlayStation and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: SAND: Raiders of Sophie - Official Release Month Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Set in feudal Japan amidst a fierce rivalry between the Tokugawa Shogunate and the supporters of Emperor Mutsuhito, Shadow of the Road immerses players in a world that combines tradition and modernity, Japanese mythology, and steampunk technology. Leading a diverse group of adventurers through a dynamic, enchanting realm where decisions shape destiny, players must master different characters’ various abilities to turn the tides of the war.

Shadow of the Road, the tactical RPG set in an alternative version of 19th-century Japan, will launch in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Shadow of the Road - Official 2026 Release Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Alpha Gameplay Trailer for Beautiful Light, a PvPvPvE tactical first-person extraction shooter developed by Deep Worlds. Players will infiltrate otherworldly environments to take on other teams, survive the anomalies, and secure artifacts for extraction. Beautiful Light is coming soon to PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Beautiful Light - Official Alpha Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Overview Trailer for Far Far West, a first-person action co-op PvE shooter developed by Evil Raptor. Players will traverse the dangers, trials, and tribulations of the West as robot cowboys to take out enemies, bosses, and more. Take on the invaders of the land by way of flashy weapons, defeat larger-than-life bosses, and more in Far Far West, coming soon to PC with a Playtest available now via Steam.

#IGN #FarFarWest #ActionPvE
title: Far Far West - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gothic Build Showcase Teaser Trailer for Hytale, a creation adventure RPG developed by Hypixel Studios. Players can get a glimpse at what's possible in Hytale through a level designer's work in the game to make an elaborate gothic castle within the game itslelf. Hytale is launching into Early Access on January 13 for PC.

#IGN #Hytale #RPG
title: Hytale - Official Gothic Build Showcase Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Endministrator Operator Combat Overview Trailer for Arknights: Endfield, an anime action RPG developed by Hypergryph. Players can get the rundown on the Endministrator Operator, equipped with a Destructive Sequence Basic Attack, a Sealing Sequence Combo Skill, and a flashy Finisher to put an end to an enemy's advancements. Arknights: Endfield is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), iOS, Android, and PC.

#IGN #ArknightsEndfield #ActionRPG
title: Arknights: Endfield - Official Endministrator Operator Combat Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Underground Power Facility' Map Reveal Trailer for Resident Evil Survival Unit, a mobile strategy action game developed by Aniplex and Capcom. 

Players can soon access a new map for the Search single-player mode that tasks players with descending to the depths of the mansion to restore power via the Underground Power Facility. Stand at the ready for dangers and hazards alike in the Underground Power Facility for Resident Evil Survival Unit, coming soon to iOS and Android.

#IGN #ResidentEvilSurvivalUnit #ResidentEvil
title: Resident Evil Survival Unit - Official 'Underground Power Facility' Map Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest boss trailer for Code Vein 2! 

This trailer focuses on the The Blinded Resurgence Offspring, a towering monster equipped with a golden Katana. Dodge around the wide and elegant swings from the shimmering blade, but watch out for the traps. Stepping on one will leave you locked in place to receive a very damaging strike! 

Code Vein 2 launches January 29th 2026 for PC (Steam), PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #CodeVein2 #ActionRPG
title: Code Vein 2 - Official "The Blinded Resurgence Offspring" Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. This week we take a look at 12 games we think will push the current generation of consoles to their limits. Games like Marvel's Wolverine, Control: Resonant, Resident Evil: Requiem, Gears of War: E-Day, and more are going to be amazing showcases for what the PlayStation 5 (and PS5 Pro) and the Xbox Series X (and the underpowered but still capable Series S) can really do, considering we should be entering the back half of this generation's life cycle. Plus we have last week's poll results and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming
title: 12 Games That Will Push PS5, Xbox to the Limit in 2026 - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
title: LEGO's Smart Brick will surprise you #ces

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from the PC port of the long running mobile game EvoCreo. A Pokemon-like game where you embark on an adventure, capture and tame monsters, and then make them fight. 

Gameplay captured on a PC with an RTX 5090
title: EvoCreo | The First 23 Minutes of PC Gameplay

description: A man claiming to be from the future takes the patrons of an iconic Los Angeles diner hostage in search of unlikely recruits in a quest to save the world.
title: Good Luck, Have Fun, Don’t Die - Official Trailer (2026) Sam Rockwell, Zazie Beetz, Juno Temple

title: Just wait until the South Park boys find out they can play themselves in #Fortnite! #southpark

author: IGN
description:
With Valve's Steam Machine and Steam Deck changing the landscape of handhelds and mini gaming pc's, we wanted to see what CES was saying would be the future of these gaming rigs. We got to see the Thunderobot Mix G2, Onexplayer Onexfly Apex, and The Minisforum G7 Pro. These are all really interesting entries, but the RAM shortage will play a role in their release strategy. For all things windows handhelds, and gaming, keep it locked to IGN.

#IGN #Gaming
title: What the Future of Handhelds and Mini Gaming PC's Will Be - CES 2026

author: IGN
title: MCON's magnetic gaming controller will soon be available in Light and Slim editions! #ces #gaming
